settings.html:
<style>
    #featured, #featured ul.products{
        margin-bottom: 0
    }
    #featured li.product {
	border: 1px solid #ddd;
	border-radius: 10px;
	padding: 20px 20px 35px;
	margin-bottom: 15px;
	text-align: center;
	box-shadow: 0 0 10px #ddd;
}
#featured li.product h2 {
	font-weight: 700;
	font-size: 16px;
	color: #262626;
}
#featured li.product del bdi {
	color: #ADADAD;
	font-size: 12px;
}
#featured li.product ins bdi {
	color: #3BB77E;
	font-size: 18px;
}
#featured li.product a.button {
	background: #3BB77E;
	color: #ffff;
	font-size: 14px;
	padding: 12px 24px;
	border-radius: 4px;
}
#featured li.product a.button:hover{
    background: #FDC040;
}
#featured li.product a.added_to_cart {
	background: #262626;
	color: #fff;
	padding: 7px 20px;
	font-weight: 700;
	margin-left: 10px;
	border-radius: 4px;
}
#featured li.product a.added_to_cart:hover{
    background: #FDC040;}
#featured li.product .onsale {
	background: #FDC040;
	width: 70px;
	height: 30px;
	border-radius: 0 10px;
	top: 6px;
	right: 6px;
}
@media (max-width:767px){
    #featured li.product {
	width: 96%;
	margin: 0 auto 25px;
	float: none;
    }
}
</style>
